Name: Kailys
Why you dig it (HTML and Markdown okay): Spooky atmospheric mood with beautiful sounds emerging from chaos. Electronic music with the heart of post-rock.

Name: Makyo
Why you dig it (HTML and Markdown okay): So this song has been on and off Spootles a few times over the years, and I was hoappy to find that it's back again! In particular, I'm in love with this live version from Tilburg - it's one of those live performances that tops the studio version, in my mind (which is an interesting conversation in its own right!). It's also well worth watching the [video from the concert](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iBfY86cktN0) if only for the hella drums.

Name: Amdusias
Why you dig it (HTML and Markdown okay): This is the best "maximal prog bullshit" instrumental since The Dance of Eternity. It's just a shame that a Haken instrumental means you're missing out on the singer's ridiculous Beaker voice.

Name: Chiaro
Why you dig it (HTML and Markdown okay): It makes me wanna tell the scariest possible campfire stories in the deepest darkness ^_^
